item.title: Civil Wardrobe in stores on Oct 18th!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
In stores on Wednesday Oct 18th! (Next week for Europe!)

$3.50!

From the mind of CBR's Rich Johnston!

Kaare Andrews, Ashley Wood, Darick Robertson, Ilya, Fred Hembeck, Billy Dallas Patton, Mike Netzer, Lea Hernandez, Frazer Irving, Natalie Sandalls, Sam Hart, Thomas Mauer and more!

Exclamation marks!

Visit the Civil Wardrobe website for more info.
